Articles.Content:
I continuously monitor the galaxies situation.

Our planet, federation, and whatever the heck I'm a part of at this point

I hack your cameras to show you pictures of cats instead.

My...land.

I call in the tech support and hack *your* cameras!

My technological empire

I use an EMP bomb.

My steam powered kingdom.

Looking around from your air balloon, occasionally you drop your cufflink.  

While you are trying to find it, a diesel powered ironclad crawls from the sea to the ground and occupies your kingdom.  

Your monarchy gets dethroned. Dieselpunk Administration established.

I compress the deisil and light a match. 

My charred hill

I fertilize your hill and take it over.

My green again hill

I plant flowers there. Then a golden one goes sentient and demented and kills everyone.

His hill.

A Master Herbalist covers the flower with a cloak, possesses the hill and grows many such flowers.

His/Her (not clear under cloak) hill.

i spad on everyone hill  

because everyone i know love spad, they love so much that's it's spad hill (not mine) [steping back slowly]

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-22T10:12:38Z" title="03/22/2017 10:12  AM" data-short="7 yr">March 22, 2017</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
What is spad? All I get on Wikipedia is "Single-photon avalanche diode"

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, Benjamin Kerman said:
> 
> 
> What is spad? All I get on Wikipedia is "Single-photon avalanche diode"
> 

You see! That's what he has done with the nice, peaceful hill!
My hill
No, its mine! Cause...I forgot it and left it here...
It's not a mine, it's a hill. So, not yours.
Not yours either. It was hill in the first place!

Since everybody is arguing about the hill belongs to nobody, I claim it.

My hill.

I send some lawyers to you and let them diskuss with you about ownership Rights and Subscribe Many dokuments to be the owner... (and one of them let you give the hill as present to me)...

My hill.

I land a space shuttle on the hill, realize that it would make a great launch and landing site, and claim it for the space program.

<abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> 3 hill
You suddenly realize that the Earth is flat. Literally. No hill.

My planet continues to thrive.

Our planet/federation

I launch a shuttle to make physics realize that there's a flat planet, and find [@DarkOwl57](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/161624-darkowl57/)'s planet. I land there and claim it for myself

my planet
They both stick on a piked planet and have no room to start, far from the hill.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, 53miner53 said:
> 
> 
> I launch a shuttle to make physics realize that there's a flat planet, and find [@DarkOwl57](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/161624-darkowl57/)'s planet. I land there and claim it for myself
> 
> 
> 
> 
> my planet
> 

uh.......... yeah no. Fortunately, the land that you 'claimed' is actually the area that I send my death row prisoners! Wolves gobble you up within the half hour.

Our planet/Federation.

Not quite. I had some fuel left for the main engines, and flew away, burning the wolves in the process. I land next to a town and claim the planet for myself.

my planet.
